pages.title: Meet the Flintstones
pages.text: I think it's about time to turn up the heat, don't you? If I remember rightly, you can transmute $(item)Iron Nuggets$() into $(item)Flint$() in a $(item)Cauldron$() of $(item)Liquid Mana$(). This should allow you to put together a $(item)Flint and Steel$(), useful as always for starting fires, as may be required for further use of the $(item)Cauldron$().

pages.heading: Flint
pages.description: Consumes 1 bottle of Liquid Mana (1/4 of a bucket)
